description: This creamy chocolate dessert evokes the taste of the classic Black Forest Gateaux but with a lot less of the work.
name: Black Forest Mini Trifles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g dark chocolate, keep 20g for garnish and grate into shards
150g cherries, drain and keep the kirsch/juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot to a medium heat and melt 80g of chocolate with the custard and then remove from the heat to cool.
Combine the broken brownies in a bowl with the drained cherries. Prepare your individual pots or 1 large bowl by layering as below.
Place the brownie/cherry mix at the base. Next add the chocolate cream mix.
Whip the cream into peaks with 2 tablespoons of the cherry liquid.
Place the cherry cream on top and then garnish with the 20g of chocolate shards before serving.
